thread.title: 'Carrie: The Musical' set for CSUF
thread.title_full: 'Carrie: The Musical' set for CSUF - The Orange County Register

title: 'Carrie: The Musical' set for CSUF
text:
Starting Friday, Cal State Fullerton’s Department of Theatre and Dance will present “Carrie: The Musical,” based on the novel by Stephen King.
The story centers on Carrie, a high school-aged girl who is bullied by her classmates.
She also has to deal with her overbearing mother.
Carrie uses her telekinetic powers to exact revenge on her tormentors.
Musical theater student Madeline Ellingson will star as Carrie.
Theater alumna Brooke Aston, who recently performed at the university’s Concert Under the Stars fundraiser, will take on the role of Carrie’s mother.
Theater professor James R. Taulli will direct, musical direction is by Mitchell Hanlon and choreography is by William F. Lett.
This production contains adult content and mature subject matter.
– Angie Marcos
